website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line model; though it doesn't accept oils, it has excellent features and functions.
pros: A lightweight device that's easy to use and doesn't require boiling water
Has adjustable temperature settings and is reasonably quiet to operate
Attentive customer service and 1 year warranty
cons: You can't use essential oils in it
A few faulty units either worked intermittently or stopped all together after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Defective product and dishonest manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: When I received the steam inhaler, I called MyPurMist to register my device as instructed in the user manual, I gave the serial number, and I was I was offered an extension of the warranty for an additional year. I accepted that offer and the charge for the additional year warranty was put on my credit card. The steam inhaler stopped working after 12 1⁄2 months, I contacted MyPurMist, and I provided proof that I had paid for an extended warranty for an additional year. I was told that since the item was purchased from an unauthorized dealer, neither their one year warranty, nor the extended warranty for which I paid MyPurMist for is valid
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- I have chronic sinus issues that include vertigo ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased sooner! Great Product- I have chronic sinus issues that include vertigo at times. Daily use 3 times a day has given me great relief that lasts. Now I do 2x a day. I ran out of sinus medication and had only this and pocket neti and to my surprise I was okay, My aim is to reduce and/or stop medications completely- mainly mucinex, claritin and or dayquil, So far I've been 2 days without meds and only using the purmist. Incredible to me but very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of adding the distilled water
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of my pure mist machine. The first one was portable and worked really well. I like this one as much or more than the portable one. My pure mist helps me clear my airways when i’m Having that nagging allergy cough. I told my dr about my pure mist and now she loves it and recommends it to her patients. All you’re breathing is distilled water steam and it works wonders! I set in my recliner and turn the TV on or get my favorite book and let the mist clean my lungs while relaxing. I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: What a rip-off
customer_reviews.text: I've never discovered that I've been ripped off faster than I have today. The unit arrived. I open the box, remove the plastic, add the water, add the scent pad. I turn the unit on, and BOOM, less than 10 seconds later it stops working. Talk about a con job.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F Feighner

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Great marketing, poor design and quality. I followed the instructions to the T, and all it did was flash the blue light. It never produced any steam. I contacted technical support and they sent me troubleshooting instructions within 24 hours, which did not work. I requested a return/refund. We’ll see if the seller approves it. In general, they offer a device replacement for malfunctioning products within a certain time frame (warranty), however, device malfunctions seems to be a widespread issue with this line of products. The manufacturer needs to do some major improvements on this line of products. Namely, portability, reliability, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Good Times

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use it. First time it would not turn on. 2nd time it turned on and I was able to use it. The 3rd time I tried to turn it on, it did not work at all. Very disappointed in its unreliability.For someone like me with allergy issues, already taking meds and nasal sprays I was hoping this would help me with most of my symptoms if I used it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M. Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased MyPurMist and was hoping it would help me. This one in particular did not work. I expected it to work since it was pricey at just a little over $120. I followed the instructions and only put in distilled water but it never turned on. I returned it and got my refund. I am hopeful to one day get a working item from MyPurMist as I've heard it's good. For now though, bought instead Mabis personal steam inhaler. Much bigger, but it worked and cheaper too. I'm hoping to invest in something smaller though. Hope this item works for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointing, was looking forward to using this and it did not work. followed directions and it started to steam on first use then stopped and flashed a blue light, returning and will try again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great when I first bought it. As advertised... Select the temp and it provides mist. After using it for a couple weeks I put it on the shelf and didn't use it again until I recently got a chest cold. Plugged it in and now it produces no mist. The fan runs, and starts, but no mist. I wish I could get some sort of support but Amazon says the window is closed for support. It's only been six months of intermintant use. I feel it should still work properly.
customer_reviews.author: holly tharp

customer_reviews.title: Won't run on distilled water, needs purified water from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this unit, as it requires special water from the manufacturer; which is quite expensive. I ended up going with the AC corded unit, which does hand inexpensive distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Paulus

customer_reviews.title: Did not actually ever work
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a product riddled with quality control issues. It never worked, and the return window closed very quickly after the holiday so we were stuck with it. There must be a better system out there.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews and buy something else that is reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work. Per the troubleshooting section of the manual, blue flashing lights warrants a phone call to costumer service. They never called me back. I returned the waste of plastic. For a unit that is $100 more than other options, I expect way more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Choked out by an Inhaler !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stupid thing worked for all of 4 minutes then it shut off. Called the toll free # and they were no help. This thing was dead in the water. This thing is way overpriced for the number of issues it has had with myself and other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this steam inhaler! It is light weight and so easy to use. The warm steam breaks up my sinus and nasal congestion caused by my seasonal allergies and occasional colds. It is also helpful for easing sore throats as well. My first one lasted over five years. I bought a new one in Feb. and accidentally broke it by knocking it off the nightstand. The company responded to my email within a day and replaced it for free! I highly recommend this product for anyone who is looking for a natural alternative for relief of sinus congestion!
customer_reviews.author: Don Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Two out of three did not work
customer_reviews.text: Corded one did not work out of the box. Company upgraded to cordless that only worked for three days. Third one sent has been working well for one month. First one I bought two and half years ago worked for a month and the replacement worked for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: did not work I bought two different one neither one worked one day.
customer_reviews.text: did not work I bought two different one neither one worked one day.
customer_reviews.author: MARK LOVE

customer_reviews.title: Came broke..blue lights flashing. Puremist...pure crap! This is a scam. NO STARS
customer_reviews.text: This item came broke. I have a special needs daughter who was having one of countless brain surgeries so was unable to use it till May 3rd. It was broke. My only money saved up for this was stolen cuz it was broken!! I will continue to write bad reviews until I receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hilario

customer_reviews.title: was broken when it came and now can't return! never order this kind of thing from AMAZON AGAIN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these misters for years. some of them just don't work but they do a great job on my asthma and sinuses so I reorder every year or two when they break. This one wouldn't start from the beginning and AMazon says they won't take it back, despite their policy of additional time during COVID19.
customer_reviews.author: yotidog

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 45 seconds and quit
customer_reviews.text: A blue flashing light indicates that the customer should contact customer service...good luck. Leave a call back...receive no callback. Leave a message...no call back. This is looking like a scam. The unit worked for about 45 seconds and then stopped...with a blinking blue light. Not a good product. Not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery D. Shain

customer_reviews.title: DISTILLED WATER ONLY
customer_reviews.text: So you really do need ONLY distilled water. I tried spring water cuz its better for you. Took me 20 min to figure it out. No i didnt read slowly the instructions, it would have saved me the headache i know. The marks are because it only takes distilled water. Its very hard to come by right now for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: JustNett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second MyPurMist Classic. When they work, they help with congestion but unfortunately they don't last. The first one lasted a little over a year. I bought another one in June 2019 and it's already dead. There is a way to file a warranty claim on the website. When you do, you get a confirmation email saying that someone will respond within 2 business days. I've filed the claim three times on three separate weeks and I've never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: BBTM

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my daughters voice teacher in college so I purchased this item for $120 in September 2018 and it was great while it worked. It started malfunctioning 3 months later in December and now in February it is not working. Very disappointed and out $120.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Melendez

customer_reviews.title: They break, they stop working, they won't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: We tried 4, I repeat FOUR of these. Each time they sent a new one, it broke after 3-5 uses. We took care of the piece, but it was always similar issues I'd read and still read - it just stops turning on. I'd been told the cordless were so much better by many friends, but that's what we tried! Totally useless. The only mechanism that lasted longer than 1 week, while used, was great. But then nothing. 4 times!!! Save your money and buy a cheap personal mesh nebulizer elsewhere on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Justin N Adair

customer_reviews.title: MyPurMist hand held steamer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use during the pollen season, if you live in the forest, it is almost hard to breathe during this time.. I use the distilled water along with colidial silver, I could tell a difference after the first time I used it... I would buy this again.....
customer_reviews.author: Busdriverkel

customer_reviews.title: Good product - didn’t clear up my ussues
customer_reviews.text: Great product ;however, did not take care of my sinus issues
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Run from this product and company
customer_reviews.text: Unit was slow to ship without a tracking number and was defective out of the box. Seller/manufacturer wants me to jump through hoops to return/refund their junk. There is no point in buying this nasal steamer or anything else from this bunch unless you are into wasting time and being trumped.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Washington

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned out after only a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: So I really liked this product and I used it as the directions specified. After only a few uses, I cranked it up and it operated for a few seconds and then a burning smell started and the motor stopped with a brief puff of smoke. Motor burned out. Not very happy. Returning the unit for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: busflyer

customer_reviews.title: Clear head
customer_reviews.text: This product works as described. For me performs excellent. It has eased my sinus issues. I had been using my electric plug in model. Decided to buy the traveling type which can and is handy for me to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Vernonmpegram

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these in December 2018 and by Feb 1, 2019 both stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: dr white

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Product worked good for 2 weeks then flashing blue light. Vender replaced with new unit. It lasted 3 weeks. Good while it worked but obviously quality lacking. Gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny H

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: 6 months later and it stops working!!! Piece of crap!!!
customer_reviews.author: JoAngeli Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Stopped giving warm steam, THEY REPLACED IT!
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok earlier a few times. Now does not give warm steam. I contacted customer support via email. THEY ARE REPLACING THE UNIT. Good service!
customer_reviews.author: SANJAY GUPTA

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. It really helped me when I was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It really helped me when I was sick, to keep my sinuses and lungs loose. I have continued to use it now that I am well to keep my nose and sinuses from drying out in this winter weather. It really works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last. SO frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: This item is wonderful when it works, for as long as it works, but, apparently, not built to last. SO frustrating! I bought one unit on May 23 of 2018. It stopped working by the end of October.
customer_reviews.author: a guy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Glad I picked the unit that runs off power supply rather than rechargeable because this one does not need special water cartridges. You just need a inexpensive bottle of distilled water
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good product to ease the night coughs
customer_reviews.text: The product was given to me the first time at my daughter's home when I experienced the night coughs. I used it for a couple of days right before heading to bed and it eased my coughs during the night sleep. Now I purchased it for myself even I have not gotten the chance to use it, I believe it will meet my need when the time came.
customer_reviews.author: charles chen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: My Humidifier stopped working after using it a couple of times. I bought when I was pregnant and my sinuses were active. But now that I wanted to use it again it had a very strong burning smell and the light was blinking and stopped working. For what I paid for, I expected it to last. I did buy the protection plan and it's still under warranty, so I'm going to explore my options. I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Followed all the set up instructions, plugged it in, heard the motor run for 10 seconds and then it was dead. Didn't get to use it. Called their customer service who tried to trouble shoot it to no avail. Very disappointing considering the price point on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was just what I needed to clear my sinus so I can breath better when I exercise
customer_reviews.text: The MyPurMist works as I hoped it would. It was just what I needed to clear my sinus so I can breath better when I exercise
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: An ok alternative
customer_reviews.text: Expected more relief quicker than I experienced, but can still deal with. Saying that, the price could have been much lower considering the simplicity of the apperatus.
customer_reviews.author: Northside

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pricey little item and it worked for about 2 minutes then quit. Customer service walked me through several resets which didn't work either so I returned it. Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for chest congestion
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great when I have had very bad chest congestion where instead of going to Urgent Care I was able to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer for singers
customer_reviews.text: Im a vocalist, working on my masters. This steamer is wonderful! I only wish I’d purchased the cordless one.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for about a month now. Using it twice a day. Very happy with the results. This is my second MyPurMist ... first one lasted about five years. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Pulled it out of the box. Plugged it in. Set it up. Didn't work. Called the number on the box and they explained how to "reset it". Did as instructed. Didn't work. Sending back for a refund. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: cbrook

customer_reviews.title: It really makes a difference for me with my allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used it for years. It helps me greatly with my allergies. I can breathe much easier with it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ highlandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Huge plastic burning smell
customer_reviews.text: Since winter here is so dry, I bought this product to cope with the dry weather and try to moist my sinus area. However, this product generated a strong plastic burning smell while working. I doubt this is poisonous,stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: meifang zheng

customer_reviews.title: product is not working and i really need this item
customer_reviews.text: i've order the (mypurmist) and up to this day its not working i dont know whats goin on... from the day i get it in hand it didnt turn on..... i think amma send it back for you could see it for your self....
customer_reviews.author: nadira

customer_reviews.title: Mister
customer_reviews.text: Like the hand held convenience and the mist. Wish it was cordless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Like this product to help keep my sinuses clear works great
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ogg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good product to be used in children and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We got our yesterday and it works perfect. My wife and breath now. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: frankie e vollano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for singers who need to steam regularly!! I get frequent sinus allergies and infections and this has improved my sinus health tremendously. The best thing I noted, however, was the service. My device stopped working after just a few months of use, but they were able to ship a new one in for me quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Piers

customer_reviews.title: MyPurMist usasge is a drug free way to resolve sinus/nasal issues.
customer_reviews.text: For sinus and health issues, using several times a day, first order replaced hardware defeat, Amazon was great replace item, Received MyPurMist and it has been a life savor.
customer_reviews.author: susan torres

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: They do not work I purchased 2 of them and they do not work. It a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wished I could go back just a few years ago and purchased this wonderful product! I use it many times a day and since I got it I have been sleeping through the night! 👍
customer_reviews.author: RALPH TERRY

customer_reviews.title: You can use all year around
customer_reviews.text: I love the device it’s my second one it really works for everything sinus,allergies,corona virus. It’s also great for the kids with being able to adjust the temperature. Money well spent 😘 THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Stephaney smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke at first use
customer_reviews.text: Blue flashing lights turned on at first use. Does not work. If I could have chosen zero stars I would have. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Brown

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me what so ever and the ad was miss leading it clearly shows a cordless item and never tells you there more than one model
customer_reviews.author: kevin nawrocki

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible sinus infection for weeks. Antibiotics helped some but I was still battling nasal congestion. My grandmother recommended this product and it was a lifesaver. I felt so much better after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Blue flashing lights. Call purmist company they will be mailing a new one in 5 to 7 days. Hope the next one works.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mangrum

customer_reviews.title: High quality device!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I am impressed with the quality of this device. Thank you so much! It came very quickly and it works very well. The machine is very easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Leon-Bernard

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work more than ten seconds before a blue light started blinking. manual just says “contact support”
customer_reviews.author: technophile

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I just used 3 times and it broken, and I could not returned it . very expensive and no guarantee . I do not recommend ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money
customer_reviews.text: This does not work and does barley work for a day dont waste money on this junk
customer_reviews.author: Rupinder Pal kaur

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few weeks. Seller (Grace's Getaway) will not respond to my inquiry about returning the PurMist
customer_reviews.author: joshua graner

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Same as the other reviews, stopped working and blue light just blinked after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Michaud

customer_reviews.title: it should be reliable it is new
customer_reviews.text: sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t, not very happy with it not working when i need it the most
customer_reviews.author: Danelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son. He has allergies, and said this was a big help,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not stand on its quality
customer_reviews.text: It is nice small unit but now not enough hot air as well as difficult to obtain bottle water.
customer_reviews.author: Parshotam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I wasn’t sure if it’d be worth the money with the cheaper knock offs on the market, but it definitely was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES CLEAR SINUS PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and was purchased for my personal use!!
customer_reviews.author: GARY BRYANT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get it to work .. may be defective..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've 3 of these over the last 10 years and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've 3 of these over the last 10 years and the heat output is very weak at it's highest level.
customer_reviews.author: Bizweep

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: For one I don't have the patience to hold this thing for 15 minutes. Next when I shut it off it does not turn off. The steam is so so nothing to rave about. I would never buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works well but I thought I had ordered the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well but I thought I had ordered the battery operated one so you need to be able to be by a receptacle.
customer_reviews.author: Marie  durkin

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my mom and she is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom and she is very happy with it. It also came a day before it was scheduled
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage and you should save your money. this is my second unit my first unit failed in less than 6 months and i emailed the company and not even a reply to my email. i then decided to buy a second because when it works it works really well and once again in less than 6 months the exact same problem so now i know i didnt do anything wrong the first time. I for one will NEVER buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works a handful of times only
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year, and used it about 5 times. It worked great. Took it out of the box for my daughter, this year, and a flashing blue light continues to flash. I've tried resetting it several times, even emptying and refilling, to no avail. Would not recommend simply because it is now too late to return and costs way to much. Recommend a neti pot for the disposable society.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon V. Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Two dead units. I'm giving up.
customer_reviews.text: My unit had the dreaded "flashing blue light" as described in other reviews. And like other critics, my unit died literally seconds after the first use. I was careful to read all instructions and troubleshooting advice. I contacted the company and they sent a replacement (after more troubleshooting steps). The replacement unit also died within seconds, and left me with the flashing blue light problem. Sorry, guys, I wanted this to work out. I was willing to give it a second chance. But I'm done. Product needs some QA work.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Yep. I was somewhat desperate for this thing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Yep. I was somewhat desperate for this thing to work, so despite negative reviews, I bought it anyway. Just got it out of the box. Worked for about THIRTY SECONDS. Then dreaded blue light. This thing needs either a redesign, or someone needs to have a discussion with the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Aristocles

customer_reviews.title: awesome customer services and product
customer_reviews.text: my product malfunction within first year and the customer service was really helpful. They replaced the unit and without any question and did it within one week of complaint. Now just waiting to get the new unit and start using it. I have bought 4 of these, whoever in family has used this product has loved the easy of use and how strudy the product is.
customer_reviews.author: Singh

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This is the second PurMist I have had. First one ran for years until it no longer heated. This new one was only used a few times and is leaking water from the bottom! Red light is on, full of water and now with this leak will not work. No person will answer the phone and no reply to e-mails. They don't care you spend $100 for this junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a dog...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my dog with pneumonia, the vet said warm air irritates the lungs less, and it worked great. Would have preferred one with a hose so it was lighter to hold but for the money I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered this steamer twice. The first time, it never worked and I was able to return it. The second time, it worked twice and then broke. However, since too much time has elapsed, I can't return it. This steamer is outrageously expensive vs. other options and is NOT WORTH IT. Even if it had kept working, in the end, its just a steamer. Do yourself a favor and buy the inexpensive one. It will steam just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works well - water is a challenge.
customer_reviews.text: My husband says it works extremely well, and helps his breathing every time he uses it. Our only challenge is that it uses purified water which we can only purchase in gallon size bottles....not convenient, if we use it when traveling. Otherwise, it does exactly what it says it will do, so it should be rated 4 9/10.....but that's not an option!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Kratky

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Comfortable to Use
customer_reviews.text: It has lived up to all the hype and then some. This product has been a life saver for several years, especially while at work and at home. Product has performed exactly as described. Please do not discontinue to carry this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: I REPLACED ONE PURCHAAED ELSEWHERE...THE UNIT WAS EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED. WORKING GREAT MORE POWERFUL THAN MY PREVIOUS UNIT..I REALLY THINK IF YOU GET A GOOD ONE YOU'LL LOVE IT....DOES JOB IT PROMISES .. The unit died on third use ..
customer_reviews.author: ted brooks

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice and had to return it both times. What a waste of time. The first one didn't work, the second one stopped working (and leaking water) after 2 days. I notice that a lot of other reviewers have also complained about quality issues. But surprisingly, I had bought one 3 years ago and that is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it works
customer_reviews.text: Works great when it actually works, kept turning off every couple mins and had to turn it on again multiple times, which was frustrating. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for sinuses
customer_reviews.text: We had one that lasted about 5 years and then just died right before winter. We both had colds and couldn't live without it. Don't hesitate to get one! Our son bought one too and the whole family uses it, not just for colds. Our granddaughter suffers from allergies and uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: bbinmbsc

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it didn’t work. Had to send back for a refund. This is too expensive of an item to NOT work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: More than a Christmas shopper

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive! Produces very minor results. You have to use "PurMist" water or it doesn't work. You will get a blinking red light if you use anything else. Thumbs down!!!
customer_reviews.author: CHC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great invention for allergy sufferers and congestion
customer_reviews.text: This is a great invention for allergy sufferers and congestion. I purchased this product and have used this for a 25 minute session right in my own bed and the congestion and allergies go away. The steam is mild and clears up your nasal passages very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: conrad

customer_reviews.title: It Works to help breathe! Could help with covid!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic nose part smells so you have to wash it thoroughly before use but works great feels warm or I’m yiu can use it on cool setting
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: It quit working after 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Used it 4 times, it quit working. I had on before that worked for years. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: broken after few uses!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in december, used few times, after that had a smell of something that is burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Hand held personal vaporizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact unit. Very easy to use and is self cleaning. Second one and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Walter S.

customer_reviews.title: He has a bad sinus problem that usually led to infection
customer_reviews.text: My husband can not live without it. He has a bad sinus problem that usually led to infection. Since using this product he has kept those problems away.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Be careful who you buy from, you can get Screwed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but buy from the Manufacturer chosen stores because if a problem arise you are the one who can get screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MyPurMist Classic Handheld Personal Vaporizer and Humidifier (Plug-in)
product_meta.description: MYPURMIST HANDHELD Vaporizer and Humidifier - Fast natural relief from sinus congestion, colds, and allergies. Originally developed for use in hospitals, the patented Capillary Force Vaporizer (CFV) technology used in MyPurMist, converts water to vapor without the presence of boiling water to provide INSTANT and 99.9999% GERM-FREE STEAM. The fine instant mist is temperature controlled for comfortable 100% DRUG-FREE RELIEF with no risk of overdosing. Using MyPurMist is easy - no preparation, no waiting, no cleanup! Portable & convenient, MyPurMist can be used at home, the office or while traveling. The device even dries and turns itself off after each treatment! And it’s great for the ENTIRE FAMILY. Join TENS OF THOUSANDS OF SATISFIED CUSTOMERS and enjoy soothing and gentle relief of MyPurMist. BREATHE BETTER, SLEEP BETTER! Natural steam is widely recommended for sinus, nasal and chest congestion, sinus headaches, allergies, sore throat, cough, flu, and common colds by leading medical institutions, including Mayo Clinic, Harvard Medical School, Kaiser Permanente, and WebMD. "Many of my patients have told me this is the most effective form of humidification they have ever experienced." William Berger, M.D. Allergy and Asthma Physician, California. Troubleshooting: If you have ANY issues with your MyPurMist please email at TechSupport@mypurmist.com or visit the FAQs or HELP section of our seller account on Amazon. If during normal use your device is not working correctly, we will replace it within 1 year of purchase at no cost to you. That is our promise! Please note that MyPurMist Classic may only be used with either distilled water or Mypurmist Sterile Water available on amazon). Use of any other water will void your warranty.
feature_bullets: Fast Natural Relief from Sinus Congestion, Colds, and Allergies. 100% drug-free therapy. 1 year warranty.
Easy to use and to carry around the house; Use Mypurmist Classic model with Mypurmist ultrapure sterile water OR any distilled water.
Easy: Handheld, portable with Instant ON and no maintenance. Use anywhere, anytime.
Doctor Recommended: Steam therapy is a natural decongestant widely recommended by leading medical institutions (e.g. Mayo Clinic, Harvard, Kaiser Permanente).
Advanced: Uses patented hospital technology to deliver germ-free steam with no boiling water for fast, natural drug-free relief. Use with Mypurmist ultrapure sterile water or distilled water
